ext_descriptions.ext_description: Nxxx ISO/CD TS 10303-1051 $Id: mim_descriptions.xml,v 1.1 2002/09/12 23:00:31 thendrix Exp $
A placed_datum_target_feature is a type of datum_target that represents the implicit definition of a datum target for tolerancing purposes. See ARM definition for Placed_target for more information.
The description for the placed_datum_target_feature shall be either 'point', 'line', 'rectangle' or 'circle'.
A placed_datum_target_feature shall have exactly one implicit representation.
Exactly one representation_item used for the implicit representation of the placed_datum_target_feature shall be of type placement with a name of 'orientation'.
If the placed_datum_target_feature is a point, the representation shall contain exactly one representation_item in its set of items.
If the placed_datum_target_feature is a line or circle, the representation shall contain exactly two representation_items in its set of items.
If the placed_datum_target_feature is a rectangle, the representation shall contain exactly three representation_items in its set of items.

If the description of the placed_datum_target_feature is 'circle', exactly one representation_item used for the implicit representation of the placed_datum_target_feature shall be of type measure_representation_item and length_measure_with_unit with a name of 'target diameter'.

If the description of the placed_datum_target_feature is 'line', exactly one representation_item used for the implicit representation of the placed_datum_target_feature shall be of type measure_representation_item and length_measure_with_unit with a name of 'target length'.

If the description of the placed_datum_target_feature is 'rectangle', exactly one representation_item used for the implicit representation of the placed_datum_target_feature shall be of type measure_representation_item and length_measure_with_unit with a name of 'target length'.

If the description of the placed_datum_target_feature is 'rectangle', exactly one representation_item used for the implicit representation of the placed_datum_target_feature shall be of type measure_representation_item and length_measure_with_unit with a name of 'target width'.

The subtype_exclusiveness_geometric_tolerance rule specifies that an instance of the subtypes of a geometric_tolerance shall be exactly one of angularity_tolerance, circular_runout_tolerance, concentricity_tolerance, cylindricity_tolerance, flatness_tolerance, line_profile_tolerance, parallelism_tolerance, perpendicularity_tolerance, position_tolerance, roundness_tolerance, straightness_tolerance, surface_profile_tolerance, symmetry_tolerance, or total_runout_tolerance.

Each instance of the subtypes of geometric_tolerance shall be exactly one of angularity_tolerance, circular_runout_tolerance, coaxiality_tolerance, concentricity_tolerance, cylindricity_tolerance, flatness_tolerance, line_profile_tolerance, parallelism_tolerance, perpendicularity_tolerance, position_tolerance, roundness_tolerance, straightness_tolerance, surface_profile_tolerance, symmetry_tolerance, or total_runout_tolerance.

The subtype_mandatory_geometric_tolerance rule ensures that each geometric_tolerance is a angularity_tolerance, circular_runout_tolerance, coaxiality_tolerance, concentricity_tolerance, cylindricity_tolerance, flatness_tolerance, line_profile_tolerance, parallelism_tolerance, perpendicularity_tolerance, position_tolerance, roundness_tolerance, straightness_tolerance, surface_profile_tolerance, symmetry_tolerance, or total_runout_tolerance.

Each instance of geometric_tolerance shall be of type angularity_tolerance, circular_runout_tolerance, coaxiality_tolerance, concentricity_tolerance, cylindricity_tolerance, flatness_tolerance, line_profile_tolerance, parallelism_tolerance, perpendicularity_tolerance, position_tolerance, roundness_tolerance, straightness_tolerance, surface_profile_tolerance, symmetry_tolerance, or total_runout_tolerance.
